Structs/TaxSlip.html#/s:17SwiftBeanCount.abstract: Row with the sum of all values per box

Structs/TaxSlip.html#/s:17SwiftBeanCount.name: title
Structs/TaxSlip.html#/s:17SwiftBeanCount.abstract: Title of the tax slip, the issuer and the name

Structs/TaxSlip.html#/s:17SwiftBeanCount.name: header
Structs/TaxSlip.html#/s:17SwiftBeanCount.abstract: Hearder for the tax slip, the issuer, name and tax year

Structs/TaxSlipRow.html#/s:17SwiftBeanCo.name: symbol
Structs/TaxSlipRow.html#/s:17SwiftBeanCo.abstract: If the slip is split by symbol (e.g. Stock), the symbol

Structs/TaxSlipRow.html#/s:17SwiftBeanCo.name: name
Structs/TaxSlipRow.html#/s:17SwiftBeanCo.abstract: If the slip is split by symbol (e.g. Stock), the name of it

Structs/TaxSlipRow.html#/s:17SwiftBeanCo.name: displayName
Structs/TaxSlipRow.html#/s:17SwiftBeanCo.abstract: Symbol and name for the row if existent

Extensions/MultiCurrencyAmount.html#/s:1.name: string
Extensions/MultiCurrencyAmount.html#/s:1.abstract: String which lists the absolut value of each amount in the MultiCurrencyAmount, separated by +
